name: dark-matter-marketplace
description: Claude Code plugins for development skills, agents, and productivity

plugins.name: dm-lang
plugins.description: Expert language skills: Go, Rust, TypeScript, just - idiomatic patterns, type systems, and build tools

plugins.name: dm-arch
plugins.description: Architecture patterns: SOLID principles, composition, data-oriented design, and module organization

plugins.name: dm-game
plugins.description: Game development: design framework, balance tuning, experience design, player UX, progression, game feel, playtest design, and performance optimization

plugins.name: dm-work
plugins.description: Workflow tools: orchestration, spec refinement, compression, peer review, and subagent delegation

plugins.name: dm-drvr
plugins.description: AI drivers: delegate to Codex CLI or leverage Gemini's 1M token context

plugins.name: dm-team
plugins.description: Agent Teams patterns: multi-agent coordination, deliberation, and collaborative workflows (experimental)

plugins.name: dm-tool
plugins.description: Tool design patterns: building CLIs, MCPs, and APIs that agents can use effectively
